reasoning: To identify the schools in Los Angeles County, we need the County Name from the frpm table.
To filter schools that served grades K-9, we need the Low Grade and High Grade columns from the frpm table.
To calculate the Percent (%) Eligible FRPM (Ages 5-17), we need the Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17) and Enrollment (Ages 5-17) columns from the frpm table.
To calculate the Percent (%) Eligible FRPM (Ages 5-17), we need the Enrollment (Ages 5-17) column from the frpm table.
To join the frpm table with the schools table based on the CDSCode, we need the CDSCode column from both tables.
To retrieve the school names and other details, we need the School column from the schools table.
